tooltip.explosionoverhaul.cameraShakeAmp: Multiplies the intensity of the camera shake. 0.0x = no shake, 1.0x = default.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.craterCoreRati:
For powerful explosions, this defines the crater's shape.
10% = very 'ray-like' (like a sun)
95% = almost a perfect sphere (solid bowl)
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.craterShapeInf: The 'Crater Core Ratio' setting only applies to explosions with a power of 40 or higher.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.craterSizeMult: This value multiplies the calculated base size.
Adjusts the diameter and depth of craters.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.dripstoneFalli: The radius around the player to search for pointed dripstone. High values can cause lag.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableAmbientC: If an ambient cave explosion occurs, a visual dust effect will fall from the ceiling.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableAmbientE: Enables a system that simulates distant random explosions to create a battlefield atmosphere.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableCameraSh: Enables or disables the camera shake effect from explosions.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableCaveSoun: Cave: A loud, reverberating sound when both player and explosion are in a cave.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableCraterDe: If false, explosions will still cause visual and sound effects, but won't break blocks.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableDripston: Enables or disables the falling effect for pointed dripstone.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableExplosio: Enables or disables the clustering of nearby explosives into a single, more powerful explosion.
Enables the main fiery glow particles (glow, glow_2, sglow). Disabling can improve performance.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableFallingB: If enabled, blocks will be launched from explosions. This is a server-side setting.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableFlashEff: Enables the flash overlay effect on explosions.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableGlassBre: Enables or disables glass being shattered by the explosion's shockwave.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableGroundDu: Enables the dust cloud effect from explosions.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableGroundMi: Enables the white mist cloud effect from explosions.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableLampFlic: Enables the flickering effect on Redstone Lamps near explosions.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableLineSpar: Enables or disables sparks that shoot out from the explosion's epicenter.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableMistEffe: Enables the white mist effect that spreads from explosions.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enablePlasmaSm: Enables the smoke trail that follows plasma sparks.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enablePlayerSh: Enables or disables the player shake effect from explosions.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.enableSurfaceS: Surface: A clear explosion sound in an open area.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.flashMaxOpacit: Maximum opacity of the flash effect overlay. 0% = no flash, 100% = full opacity.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.glassBlocksPer: Max glass blocks to break in one go. Prevents lag from huge explosions.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.glassBreakingB: Base number of rays for detection. More rays = higher precision but higher cost.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.glassBreakingI: How often the server processes breaking glass (1 tick = 0.05s). Lower is smoother but more resource-intensive.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.glassBreakingP: Additional rays per point of explosion power. Makes big explosions more accurate.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.glowTextureQua:
Sets the resolution for the main fireball textures.
Lower quality can improve performance. Requires resource reload (F3+T).
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.groundDustQual: Affects particle count and duration. Lower values improve performance.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.groundDustRayc: Controls how often dust particles check for the ground. Higher values can reduce performance.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.groundMistQual: Affects mist particle count and duration. Lower values improve performance.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.groundMistRayc: Controls how often mist particles check for the ground. Higher values can reduce performance.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.lampFlickerSea: The radius around the player to search for lamps. High values can cause lag.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.lineSparkAmoun: Multiplier for the number of sparks from explosions. Higher values may impact performance.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.maxAmbientExpl: The maximum power a random 'Cataclysm' tier explosion can have.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.maxExplosionDi: Maximum distance in blocks from the player where an ambient sound can originate.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.maxTimeBetween: Maximum time in seconds between ambient explosion events.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.minExplosionDi: Minimum distance in blocks from the player where an ambient sound can originate.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.minTimeBetween: Minimum time in seconds between ambient explosion events.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.mistQuality: Affects mist particle count and duration.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.mistRaycastFre: Controls how often mist particles check for the ground.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.playerShakeAmp: Multiplies the intensity of the player shake (side-to-side movement). 0.0x = no shake, 1.0x = default.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.powerTiersHead: Weights for different explosion power levels in 'Single' and 'Shelling' events.
tooltip.explosionoverhaul.scenariosHeade: Configure the types and frequency of different ambient explosion events.
